TextBlock.Text: UBILE: Is it just me, or is a moon forming from that planet's atmosphere?
OYVAR: What? That sounds nonsensical. There's no way that a moon can just-
UBILE: See? It's just... growing. Brown gas from the planet is just being sucked into that moon and getting cooled.
OYVAR: Well, I don't know about you, but I think Helioraxia just spat out all the pieces that fell into it.
UBILE: Oh, right. I almost forgot about that. So much hard work gone to waste...
